channel.title: Comments on: Devise and Rails 4
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Michael Mitchell
item.dc:creator: Michael Mitchell
item.description: Thanks a lot for having Devise ready. Looking forward to trying it with my new Rails 4 project.
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot for having Devise ready. Looking forward to trying it with my new Rails 4 project.
